H0.text: Which famous city plaza's name loosely translates as the 'Gate of Heavenly Peace'. Tiananmen Square Alternative - Chang'an Square

H1.text: Which famous city plaza's name loosely translates as the 'Gate of Heavenly Peace'. Merdeka Square

H2.text: Which famous city plaza's name loosely translates as the 'Gate of Heavenly Peace'. Red Square

H3.text: Which famous city plaza's name loosely translates as the 'Gate of Heavenly Peace'. 天安門廣場

A4.text: Tiananmen Square or Tian'anmen Square is a city square in the city center of Beijing, China, named after the Tiananmen ('Gate of Heavenly Peace') located to its north, which separates it from the Forbidden City imperial palace complex.

A5.text: The square holds the Monument to the People's Heroes, the Great Hall of the People, the National Museum of China, and the Chairman Mao Memorial Hall.
